abstract: Cisco has just sold $4 billion worth of debt, giving it more flexibility as it eyes acquisitions.
snippet: Cisco has just sold $4 billion worth of debt, giving it more flexibility as it eyes acquisitions.
lead_paragraph: With $30 billion, Cisco Systems likes to point out it has more cash on hand than any other technology company. So why did it just sell $4 billion worth of debt on Monday?

headline.main: Cisco’s Cash Hoard Swells Along With Acquisition Rumors
